Thanks to a custom-fit design, these quilted leather floor mats from

will fit a wide range of makes, models and years from a 1941 Cadillac Fleetwood, a 2020 Chevrolet C8 Corvette (shown above) and even brand new exotics like a 2021 Bentley Bentayga. To fit the needs of such a variety of cars and their owners, the floor mats are offered in more than a hundred color combination options for the mat itself as well as the border and heel pad, which practically assures that these can not only be color-matched to any car but they also offer a custom look to fit any taste.

While these floor mats add style to any car they are installed in, they are made of top-grain automotive leather that has been tanned in a special way to make them non-slip, easy to clean and waterproof. On late-model vehicles, these mats even maximize safety by securing to the carpeting using the OEM fasteners.
